column2: This character is descendant of Radovid, one of first three human kings and founder of Redania
This character is descendant of Cerbin, one of first three human kings and founder of Cintra
This character is direct descendant of Dezmod, one of first three human kings and founder of Temeria
This character is direct descendant of Baldwin, the founder of Aedirn
This character is direct descendant of Dagread, the founder of Kaedwen
This character is direct descendant of Estril, first of the House of Thyssen to rule Kovir and through his mother's side a decendant of Trodjen founder of Kovir.
This character is direct descendant of Tyr, first master of An Skellig and founder of Clan Tuirseach
This character is direct descendant of Grymmdjarr, first lord of Ard Skellig and founder of Clan an Craite
This character is direct descendant of Sove, first lord of  Spikeroog and founder of Clan Brokvar
This character is direct descendant of Otkell, first lord of Hindarsfjall and founder of Clan Heymaey
This character is direct descendant of Modolf, first lord of Undvik and founder of Clan Drummond
This character is direct descendant of Broddr, first lord of Faroe and founder of Clan Dimun
